name: Roll a Die (EpicPuppy613)
description:
Roll a Die is a game about RNG(Random Number Generator). 

The main basis of the game is the rolling of the die. You can assign different focuses for your roll, and will get different resources or currencies from that. You can level up by gaining xp and by leveling up, you unlock more features.

This game is played differently than most games, because you play this game like a command line. You can enter commands to run certain functions.

If you use the desktop app, make sure to download windows-portable, windows-exe WILL NOT WORK for itch.io desktop app.

Implemented features

  • Leveling system
  • Shop/Upgrades
  • The rolling of the dice

Planned features

  • More leveling rewards
  • Battle System
  • More shop items
  • Activities to do while waiting for power to recharge
  • Graphical Interface

Changelog

    • Cleaned up excess commands
